Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE SEGUROS.FI_PAGA_DOC_FISCAL SET COD_FORNECEDOR = :COD_FORNECEDOR, COD_CH1_DOC_FISCAL = :COD_CH1_DOC_FISCAL, NUM_DOC_FISCAL = :NUM_DOC_FISCAL, SERIE_DOC_FISCAL = :SERIE_DOC_FISCAL, DATA_EMISSAO_DOC = :DATA_EMISSAO_DOC, CGCCPF = :CGCCPF WHERE NUM_DOCF_INTERNO = :NUM_DOCF_INTERNO END SQL
